body_html:
@mrry I have the same problem that one worker got stuck at trying to connect to 3 parameter servers (which are apparently running and connected to all other workers). There are other workers on the same machine as the problematic one, and they are all connected to the ps. Also ports are assign to all servers as expected.

This behavior happens quite often (especially when num of servers and dataset is large) and the worker number, ps number or the machine number in problem are apparently random.

body:
@mrry I have the same problem that one worker got stuck at trying to connect to 3 parameter servers (which are apparently running and connected to all other workers). There are other workers on the same machine as the problematic one, and they are all connected to the ps. Also ports are assign to all servers as expected.

This behavior happens quite often (especially when num of servers and dataset is large) and the worker number, ps number or the machine number in problem are apparently random.
